casebody.data:
STATE
v.
James H. TERRELL, Jr. 55A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 19, 2018

Elizabeth J. Weese, Assistant Attorney General.

Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender, James Howard Terrell, Jr., Michele A. Goldman, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Terrell, James Howard (Jr.).

Derrick Mertz, Assistant Attorney General, Ernie Lee, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina *99The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 18th of October 2018 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 19th of October 2018."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 21st day of November 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
